languages.text: {n}Инфернус-мастер серьезен и мрачен, привычной веселой дерзости во взгляде больше нет.{/n} "Я хотел, чтобы ты увидел{mf||а} мое лицо прежде, чем я умру. Запомнил{mf||а} его. Однажды ты поймешь, какое святотатство совершил{mf||а}, и вспомнишь меня".

{n}The Infernus Master appears serious, sombre. The usual cheerful insolence has vanished from his face.{/n} "I wanted you to see my face before I die. Commit it to memory. One day, you will realise what sacrilege you have committed, and in that moment, you will remember me."
languages.original_text: {n}Инфернус-мастер серьезен и мрачен, привычной веселой дерзости во взгляде больше нет.{/n} "Я хотел, чтобы ты увидел{mf||а} мое лицо прежде, чем я умру. Запомнил{mf||а} его. Однажды ты поймешь, какое святотатство совершил{mf||а}, и вспомнишь меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Infernus Master is serious and sombre, the usual cheerful insolence gone from his gaze.{/n} "I wanted you to see my face before I die. Commit it to memory. One day you will realise what sacrilege you have committed, and will remember me."
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}El maestro de Infernus parece serio y sombrío. Su habitual insolencia jovial ha desaparecido de su rostro.{/n} «Quería que nos viéramos las caras antes de morir. Acuérdate de ella. Algún día te darás cuenta del sacrilegio que has cometido. Cuando llegue ese momento, me recordarás».
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master appears serious, sombre. The usual cheerful insolence has vanished from his face.{/n} "I wanted you to see my face before I die. Commit it to memory. One day, you will realise what sacrilege you have committed, and in that moment, you will remember me."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro de Infernus parece serio y sombrío. Su habitual insolencia jovial ha desaparecido de su rostro.{/n} «Quería que nos viéramos las caras antes de morir. Acuérdate de ella. Algún día te darás cuenta del sacrilegio que has cometido. Cuando llegue ese momento, me recordarás».
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}インフェルヌス・マスターは、真剣な重苦しい表情をしている。その顔から、いつもの生意気な明るさは消えていた。{/n}「死ぬ前に私の顔を見てほしかった。記憶に留めておいてください。ある日、あなたは自分が犯した冒涜に気づくのです。そしてその瞬間、私を思い出すでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master appears serious, sombre. The usual cheerful insolence has vanished from his face.{/n} "I wanted you to see my face before I die. Commit it to memory. One day, you will realise what sacrilege you have committed, and in that moment, you will remember me."

traits.locale_text: {n}インフェルヌス・マスターは、真剣な重苦しい表情をしている。その顔から、いつもの生意気な明るさは消えていた。{/n}「死ぬ前に私の顔を見てほしかった。記憶に留めておいてください。ある日、あなたは自分が犯した冒涜に気づくのです。そしてその瞬間、私を思い出すでしょう」
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}控火大师露出了严肃、忧郁的神色，他脸上惯常的开朗与不羁的表情消失了。{/n}“我想在我死之前，让你看到我的脸。记住这张脸，总有一天，你会意识到你做的事情是何等亵渎。到了那个时候，你会想起我。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master appears serious, sombre. The usual cheerful insolence has vanished from his face.{/n} "I wanted you to see my face before I die. Commit it to memory. One day, you will realise what sacrilege you have committed, and in that moment, you will remember me."

traits.locale_text: {n}控火大师露出了严肃、忧郁的神色，他脸上惯常的开朗与不羁的表情消失了。{/n}“我想在我死之前，让你看到我的脸。记住这张脸，总有一天，你会意识到你做的事情是何等亵渎。到了那个时候，你会想起我。”
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}Der Infernus-Meister wirkt ernst, düster. Die übliche gut gelaunte Aufmüpfigkeit ist aus seinem Gesicht gewichen.{/n} "Ich wollte, dass Ihr mein Gesicht seht, ehe ich sterbe. Dass Ihr es Euch einprägt. Eines Tages werdet Ihr erkennen, welches Sakrileg Ihr begangen habt, und in diesem Augenblick werdet Ihr an mich denken."
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master appears serious, sombre. The usual cheerful insolence has vanished from his face.{/n} "I wanted you to see my face before I die. Commit it to memory. One day, you will realise what sacrilege you have committed, and in that moment, you will remember me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Infernus-Meister wirkt ernst, düster. Die übliche gut gelaunte Aufmüpfigkeit ist aus seinem Gesicht gewichen.{/n} "Ich wollte, dass Ihr mein Gesicht seht, ehe ich sterbe. Dass Ihr es Euch einprägt. Eines Tages werdet Ihr erkennen, welches Sakrileg Ihr begangen habt, und in diesem Augenblick werdet Ihr an mich denken."
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}Loin, très loin de son habituelle insolence joviale, le maître-infernus affiche une expression sombre et sérieuse.{/n} « Je voulais juste que vous voyiez mon visage avant que je meure. Gardez-le en mémoire. Un jour, vous vous rendrez compte du sacrilège que vous avez commis, et alors, vous vous souviendrez de moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master appears serious, sombre. The usual cheerful insolence has vanished from his face.{/n} "I wanted you to see my face before I die. Commit it to memory. One day, you will realise what sacrilege you have committed, and in that moment, you will remember me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Loin, très loin de son habituelle insolence joviale, le maître-infernus affiche une expression sombre et sérieuse.{/n} « Je voulais juste que vous voyiez mon visage avant que je meure. Gardez-le en mémoire. Un jour, vous vous rendrez compte du sacrilège que vous avez commis, et alors, vous vous souviendrez de moi. »
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}İtfa Üstadı, oldukça ciddi ve ağırbaşlı bir duruşa geçiyor. Yüzünden o neşeli küstahlık ifadesi kayboluyor.{/n} "Ölmeden önce yüzümü görmeni istedim. Hafızana kazı. Bir gün kutsala karşı gerçekleştirdiğin suçları fark edeceksin, o an beni hatırlayacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master appears serious, sombre. The usual cheerful insolence has vanished from his face.{/n} "I wanted you to see my face before I die. Commit it to memory. One day, you will realise what sacrilege you have committed, and in that moment, you will remember me."
